original_text:
If one turns away his ear from hearing the law,
    even his prayer is an abomination.
korean_text: 사람이 귀를 돌려 율법을 듣지 아니하면 그의 기도도 가증하니라

sentences.original_text: If one turns away his ear from hearing the law
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 율법을 듣는 것에서 귀를 돌리면

sentences.original_text: even his prayer is an abomination.
